text: Peter John "P. J." Carlesimo (born May 30, 1949) is an American basketball coach. Most recently he was the interim head coach of the NBA's Brooklyn Nets. Carlesimo was born on May 30, 1949 in Scranton, Pennsylvania. He is the son of college basketball coach and athletic director Peter A. Carlesimo.PJ Carlesimo . 2012-13 Brooklyn Nets media guide. Carlesimo studied at Fordham University. He is married and has two sons. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:National Basketball Association coaches Category:Sportspeople from Scranton, Pennsylvania
title: P. J. Carlesimo
